akn:content.akn:p: (a) Assessment of skills Each program agency shall assess the educational level of participants at the time of their entrance into the program, using any available records or simplified assessment means or methodology and shall, where appropriate, refer such participants for testing for specific learning disabilities.
(b) Enhancement of skills Each program agency shall, through the programs and activities administered under this division, enhance the educational skills of participants.
